    • Method Detail

      • getParm

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getParm()

      • getJpqlQuery

        public java.lang.String getJpqlQuery(java.util.List search,
                            JPLConstrains constrains)
                              throws SQLConstrainException
        This method create the JPL query
        Parameters:
        search - is a List object with the internal list has 4 elements. The first element is the logical operator to link with the previous condition (empty string for the first list). The second element is the FIELD on the DataSet to be used to compare. The third element is the operator to compare. The fourth element is the string to be searched.
        constrains - The JPL Constrain to be used on the search
        Returns:
        a JPLQ string
        Throws:
        SQLConstrainException
